alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 7:58PM PST until December 26 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * CHANGES...None. * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Rough lake conditions on Pyramid Lake with wave heights of 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties and Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...8 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous boating conditions on Pyramid Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated gusts in excess of 60 mph cannot be ruled out in wind prone areas.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
